ygData.subject: Re: Missing Songs!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ll repeat my earlier comment on this thread.  Whether or not your invis on a type of mob seems to depend on your level.  I suspect our invis is really
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 15 Feb 2000 firehawk@... wrote:
> > From: John_Senior@...
> >
> > Sonorus Clouding does not work in Lower Guk, that is why it would be useful
> > to have at level 39, you won't be needing to go deep into L guk until this
> > level so it's about the right time to get it.
>
> Down there John, you explained it, however what you
> explained does not equal your answer. Our invis song
> works against undead of just about all but see invis types
> and the ones in Lower guk. That is not a need for invis to
> undead but a fix for the Lguk zone.. Or a clarification as
> to what they are.
>
> I have tested with those who have invis to undead and
> standard invis.. Clouding -IS- invis plus invis to undead.
> There is just a quirk with Lguk

I'll repeat my earlier comment on this thread. Whether or not
your invis on a type of mob seems to depend on your level. I
suspect our invis is really (invis) + (invis to undead - 10
levels) or something like that. Clerics and paladins could
cast invis to undead to roam inside Unrest rather early on,
which my song didnt' become effective until the low 20s.

If this is the case, then our invis does not work in LGuk by
design.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
